website_summaries.verdict: A popular top-selling model that has some similar features and issues as others in its class. 50-foot length is practical for most customers.
pros: 50-foot expandable hose that offers a reasonably durable yet lightweight design
Its brass fittings and re-designed kink-free core covered by rugged fabric make it a solid deal
cons: Though it comes with an 8-pattern nozzle, it doesn't feel durable and prone to leaks
Some reports of leaks in the hose too

customer_reviews.title: Nice hose! Lol
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought. Looks great (nice copper ends). Matching nozzle. Shut off valve at the end. Nice price. Works great. 5 stars. Very satisfying purchase
customer_reviews.author: William Landers

customer_reviews.title: Brand baiting customers for five star positive reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but even if they product is great. And I'm not suggesting it is. Any brand caught baiting customers for positive reviews will automatically be given 1 star. If you have a good product just ask a customer to review. Don't offer free goods in lottery style exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Price Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Better Quality
customer_reviews.text: Really works well, perfect size and length, the nozzle has a few different modes, so I use the hose for a different uses, highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Premature wear.  Returned.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I’ll skip over the positive features and just mention the negative. After about one month of use the exterior wrap of the hose separated from the interior, see picture. Fortunately it was just within the deadline for return to Amazon so I’ve already received a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Neal A. Wellons

customer_reviews.title: Now That’s A Hose
customer_reviews.text: It has weight to it unlike some of the other hoses of it kind. It has metal fittings that are not going to crack. So far I’m pleased and just ordered another one so now I can water both sides of the property at the same time rather than hauling this one hose all over the property. I only ordered one to see what the quality was like first.. a record speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Parrot parents

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Holes after 2 months.  Get something else, not this.
customer_reviews.text: 2 months old and it's full of teeny holes throughout the hose. It's been hanging on a plastic hose holder (Rubbermaid) and gets wound up after each use. Why the holes?? I am disgusted with this product. My yard is fenced in. Wild animals aren't gnawing on this at night. This hose is complete garbage.
customer_reviews.author: love2buy

customer_reviews.title: This hose breaks after 6mos of light use
customer_reviews.text: Was excited when I got this hose & it was flexible, lightweight & so easy to use. I was using it to water 4 potted plants & a small patio area. After 6 months of use, water started pouring out under the fittings. I thought paying a little more for a garden hose would mean Id get my money's worth. Save yours.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Huge number of leaks just 3 months old - now "too late" to return
customer_reviews.text: This is the most I have spent on a hose in a very long time - thinking to purchase a product that was durable. Am VERY DISAPPOINTED in its durability in that it has now sprung so many leaks - just below the faucet area - that I will not be able to use it anymore. Just 3 months later, and I will need to buy ANOTHER hose. I am furious that the product does not seem to be able to be returned after 30 days of purchase. I will NEVER purchase another item from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not to buy this product!!
customer_reviews.text: The hose was useless! Water came out of spicket forcefully but only trickled out at the end of the hose. I had to go to the store and buy a new one. Buying the hose was a waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: 50’ is supposed to be 50’ - it’s not with this hose.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t rate durability- have only had it one day. I ordered 50’, quite simply it’s not. Brass fittings are nice, however you should not need to s-t-r-e-t-c-h it to be 50’. 50’ is 50’ Can’t order this again. Second one.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Lind

customer_reviews.title: The perfect hose!
customer_reviews.text: It's great@ It does everythinh it says it will do and does stretch to 50 and comes back to original size. theon/,off switch works, comes with extra gaskets, made with nice solid brass, and the spray gun with multiple spray options is a bonus. It also fits in my small wash bucket!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way shorter than advertised. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The 50 ft hose measures about 20 feet stretched out. And a taut hose isn’t a great tool—when you set it down it doesn’t stay with you. It’s just not useful. The nylon sleeve will get filthy. Overall a very bad buy. I’m sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: donutbrew

customer_reviews.title: Leak
customer_reviews.text: First time use and hose has a leak, how do I return it, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved this product and how portable it was. Within less than a year, it has sprung leaks all over the hose and the handle is leaking and spraying water from all over the plastic parts. It has not been out in the sun and was indoors over winter. This product is too good to be true. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chrono

customer_reviews.title: I love these hoses but they don't seem to last!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd GrowGreen 50ft hose I have purchased. I've come to the conclusion that they are only good for one season. Two times, just after 12 months, the inner tube exploded and the hose became useless. I absolutely love how convenient the expandable hose is so I ordered new ones. The brass fittings are definitely an upgrade as the plastic fittings were more brittle. Not sure if the inner tube can be made to last. Starting to wonder if manufacturer designs the hose so it breaks?!
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Stores easily and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.text: Love this hose so far. Had it for a week and it is so easy to move around. I had a hose reel box with a plastic hose. It kinked and was heavy and sometimes a pain to crank the reel to get it back in the box. I bought a dollar store bucket for this hose and it fits nicely. Can’t believe how compact it is when no water is in it. Tucks begins a bush well. I can pull it through my garage to water the flowers and plants in the back yard with no issues. I actually enjoy the ease of using it. Makes all watering jobs easier.
customer_reviews.author: Carol D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this hose and bought a second not long after I bought my first. However, shortly after that, hose number one separated from the connector to the spigot and was beyond repair. The sprayer to the second hose broke the week after that. Hose number two is still working awesome, and I love how lightweight, maneuverable, and easy it is to store. It never knots or kinks and essentially puts itself away once the water is turned off. But if you're looking for a product you'll have for years, spend the money on something of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hardy

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: It is still new so hard to really say. When it empties of water it is very small. It is light and easy for this old gal to deal with. Just have to turn it off and let the water out to make it small... I save the one plant close to the bib now to empty it out on. So far I really like it. Don't know how it will hold up but I am hoping. Love the color.
customer_reviews.author: florida friend

customer_reviews.title: To receive product as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product is 50 food when pressurized with no water flow. When water is released from the nozzle the hose shortens automatically retracts to half the length. This is a real nusience when watering flowers. The hose in back of you will drag itself over the plants.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T HOLD UP!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hose 10 months ago, primarily because it's description stated it was warranted for 2 years. The hose sprang a tiny leak after 3 months and completely split lengthwise two weeks ago. When I checked back with Amazon, it says there was only 30 days for a return....so I tried to contact the seller and it looks like they have gone out of business. Don't be fooled to think this hose will perform as described. I'm so disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Annybet

customer_reviews.title: Great Hose for about a month :-(
customer_reviews.text: Update - this hose sprung a leak in less than two months. It was used normally and was not damaged. BAD! I love this hose because it is compact and goes back to being compact after using it. It is very light and not bulky or heavy like a regular rubber hose. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sue C

customer_reviews.title: Sprang a leak the first time...
customer_reviews.text: Sprang a leak the first time I used this thing, spraying a room with water. I used this in my house only once, it only touched the carpeted floor... So I really don't know how the hell this thing is worth any money at all if it can't last one use. Going to give it one more try, maybe I got a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY PERIOD
customer_reviews.text: Purchased twice in span of year and one about 2 years all snapped and broke eventually leaking which cannot be fixed which goes in trash it’s waste of money not buy again , it expands and contour when new after few week of usage either is nozzle break or pipe start leaking
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Leaks at connection
customer_reviews.text: It leaked badly at the faucet connection. I even tried using some teflon tape but after close inspection its not leaking where the brass fitting screws on to the hose bib, its leaking below that where the brass fitting is secured to the rubber hose.
customer_reviews.author: WebStyle

customer_reviews.title: So easy to handle and put away!
customer_reviews.text: I grew weary of lugging my heavy hose around the yard and struggling to put it away. This hose is surprisingly lightweight and easy to use. Stores neatly and discreetly in a flower pot too. Beware, the exterior is not smooth and may catch on rocks and such. The real test will be if it works just as well next year! Couldn't beat the price with nozzle included.
customer_reviews.author: idaho cpa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have never returned anything in my life but I bought 2 the green and the heavy duty black and they were absolutely rubbish did not last 2 weeks , I don’t like to say anything bad about anything just used them as rope.
customer_reviews.author: christopher.choudhry

customer_reviews.title: How it works
customer_reviews.text: Did not realize that if I want to do a small watering a short distance from the source of the water I have to fill most of the 50 foot and use all the water before it will shrink. Shrinking is achieved by the water being removed from the hose. I could leave the water in the full length of the hose for the next time that I want to do some watering but I would not be able to have it shrink near the faucet. Otherwise fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Cantine

customer_reviews.title: Could be good hose if not for seal at top around hookup
customer_reviews.text: Turned on once to checkout and seems The material around top of hose is not sealed good seems there is a small leak around top If it wasn’t for that it probably would be okay It did expand and shrink as supposed to But put aside and trying to figure out what I should do Do want it to be okay Seems like it coy be good product if that was fixed ?? Lori kunka
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Better than the last expandable
customer_reviews.text: The last expandable got leak after two years and have much more hope for this one. It surprised me how much it stretches. At first site it was too short to reach the fence but as I got closer, it stretched enough to water the bush beyond the fence. Then, it retract back to shorter length without awkward waiting like my last expandable. So far so good, no, great! Crossing my fingers that this one last at least 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Baba

customer_reviews.title: Very Light!
customer_reviews.text: Having purchased these types of hoses in the past and having them leak in the first month, I was leery about ordering this one. But I love the lightness and the price was more than I had paid, so I bit the bullet and I love it! Caveat: since I have had problems with this type of hose, I have been online for over 30 minutes trying to register it! Still not registered though I have signed up to receive emails, get a discount and keep informed of new products!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Balvanz

customer_reviews.title: Handy and light. But shrinks back as water pressure is released
customer_reviews.text: I like that is very light in weight. I don’t like that after it extended to it’s stated length, it shrinks back when I start to release the water pressure while watering the plants. I had to pull back hard so that to reach the plants to be watered. I did exactly the instructions by manufacturer to wait until the hose is fully extended but still shrinks back. Serves the purpose for now but I will try another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: shrly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long enough for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple areas to hand water with spigots in several areas. Moving this hose between and around various plants is much easier. I had rubber hoses that lasted forever but were bulky to store and heavy to manipulate between plants. They don't last for about a year. The cost is very high for the durability. However my back is appreciative of the weight and maneuverability.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, tightens (on faucet I have it on) over period of time, after water turned off.
customer_reviews.text: After you turn the water off, the hose holds its length for a time. On the faucet I'm using, the water gradually recedes & the hose "tightens" up over time, so don't wind too tightly on a holder. It IS lightweight, and filling it with water makes it lengthen. I got it for my mom, who is 87 and doesn't have a lot of energy. She uses it to water plants in front of her duplex and it works well for her. She couldn't handle a regular heavy rubber hose.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Dorsett

customer_reviews.title: It was a great product until it wasn’t.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great, at first. Then the fabric must have gotten caught on something outside and when I went to turn the water on, the rubber on the inside ballooned up. I tried turning the water off, but it pooped right in front of me and my kids. I will never purchase this product again!! I’ll be using the old fashioned hoses going forward.
customer_reviews.author: ELK

customer_reviews.title: This is really a cool hose.
customer_reviews.text: This hose is really lightweight and so easy to move it around I'm really glad I bought it, I'm tired of hoses that kink up even though the manufacturer claims they don't. The only problem is I wish you had an instruction sheet about how to use it so it coils back up instead of having to view the video. I wouldn't have watched the video expect other people were claiming they were having a problem with the hose not recoiling, but the video makes it easy to understand, but an instruction sheet would have been nice. I also appreciate the extra washers that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cecile A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good until it leaks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hose in April 2020 for my front yard. It was lightly used to water two window boxes and a new tree. The sprayer was great and the hose was light weight and very easy to maneuver. Unfortunately only after about four and a half months of use it sprung a small leak near the spigot that within two days was a massive hole. It is totally inoperable. I was trying to find a way to cut off the leaking part and reattach the end piece, but so far I’ve been unsuccessful. Since it’s supposedly a lifetime warranty, I’ll try contacting the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sprung a leak after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this hose May 10th 2020 and used it to water my garden. Initially I thought its a fantastic little hose and I was glad I bought it. Until this morning, I walked out and I heard water running. I thighs the kids inflatable pool had sprung a leak. Nope my son forgot to turn off the faucet last night and something within the hose broke. Water was flowing out from below the metal coupling. I tried tightening it water kept flowing. So I turned it off. As I walked out into the yard, I discovered my entire yard is saturated. Now I need to buy a new hose. I've only it for 2 months. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Candydiva04

customer_reviews.title: Short lived. Very short lived.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two, both failed in the same way after a month. The "spring" inside separated from the hose fitting and the hose unraveled internally. When they worked they were great, but they failed sooooo quickly.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Game changer of a hose
customer_reviews.text: So this hose is amazing. It's not just a bit different from the hoses you have used for decades (depending on your age). It is really revolutionary. The result is a hose that is dramatically easier to handle, to hang up, to store and to move about as you're using it. It shrinks to a relatively short very flexible length when water is not flowing through it. When water is flowing through it it expands in length while still being extremely flexible and light. The nozzle that comes with it with varying sprays works efficiently and well and seems solidly made, though we've had it for only about a month or so of use. Can't recommend the product highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: JohnT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comes with the hand held sprinkler head
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit early for me to rate this product as I've only used it for a week, but so far it works very well and seems to be of much better quality than others I've had before. I've gone through at least three of this sort of expandable hose (not this brand) and they've all fallen apart at the end where the hose either goes into the spigot or attaches to the sprinkler head, or spring leaks. They don't last at all. I have one other hose of this type which has lasted for quite a few years, but this one looks like it will last a long time. It's much better quality than others I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Not as long as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Sure, when under pressure and the valve is closed it might be 50'. However, be aware, that if you use it unattended, as with a turret garden lawn sprinkler, it will shrink up and therefore change direction. It's almost at a point where I have to put a large rock on it to hold the sprinkler in place and maintain proper direction of the water flow. So, today I am buying the competitor Ailuze 50' hose to see if it is any better.
customer_reviews.author: Galen Scott

customer_reviews.title: Work fine but don't last a long time (more than a year).
customer_reviews.text: This is the our third expandable hose. The first two began leaking at the point where the expandable hose attaches to the metal connector to the faucet. These heavy leaks are through the expandable hose We haven't had any freeing weather this year so that is not the problem. It seems they need some reinforcement in the area near the inlet connection. My wife really likes the fact that they are so easy to use. I don't like replacing them every year.
customer_reviews.author: JohnD

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: All lightweight expandable hoses eventually break. I bought 2. One finally burst at the end of the 2nd year. The other still works. That is just how these hoses are. It's worth it to me not to have to lug a heavy hose around. IMPORTANT... Do not pull (stretch) these hoses. The older plastic gets the more fragile it becomes, especially sitting in the sun all day. If you force the hose to stretch it WILL BURST. I learned that the first time and have had great success after that. My kid just stretched one the other day, which is why the first one just broke. 😔
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer101

customer_reviews.title: Super Lightweight and Manuverable!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this hose. We've had a few different kinds now and we always end up returning to this style. This particular brand came with a multi-option sprayer head; LOVE IT. Great options, great strength, and very user friendly. I was able to shoot it out full stream at about 20 ft give or take. All the flexibility lessens greatly when the water is turned on so in that aspect it isn't as easy or light weight as it is when you start out. In comparison to those old school huge hoses though, lifting this thing to move around the garden is a dream. Can't complain about great quality at all here. Best hose we've purchased yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Turley

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I've seen these advertised on TV for some time and always thought it was something that would only last for a few weeks and then curl itself into hopeless knots as it contracted back. My wife uses it to water several garden beds and finds it most helpful not having to drag around a heavy, standard 50 ft. hose and then try and rewind it on the holder. This hose does expand quickly, it waters as well as any standard hose and it does creepily resemble an approaching snake as it retracts itself. She loves that it only takes 3 or 4 loops to replace it on the hose holder.
customer_reviews.author: Denton Fender

customer_reviews.title: Grow Green Hose
customer_reviews.text: This hose is very flexible and convenient to use. It allows great water pressure with ease of maneuvering around the yard. This was a replacement for a previous model hose that is similar. However, the Grow Green hose is much more useful.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.  Was not 50 feet
customer_reviews.text: This product hardly stretch 20 feet. I would like to retune it. It was suppose to be 50 fee
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This hose requires full pressure to stretch out - and once you spray the water that is in the hose -- it starts contracting again. That means that I had to constantly be tugging on the hose and pulling it to go around my yard and potted plants to water them. Used it a couple of times and just gave up: what a piece of nonsense. Yes, it does reduce to a nice, soft, lightweight pliable pile but it's not really all that stretchable (I don't think the 50' hose actually stayed at 50' at any point) and it's just not as satisfactory as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: How often do you look at a garden hose and go WOW ?! I was pretty amazed at how classy this thing is....it just seems so well built with solid metal fittings ...I haven’t the words to describe it really...it has a really nice feel to it...okay I give up...but it’s like an heirloom garden hose that will last forever and you’ll be happy it does because you’ll never want another...I have it on my deck...pretty sure I wouldn’t want to be dragging it around the yard in the dirt but it would probably be fine...I just wouldn’t want it to get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Started leaking just after my return ran out, liked first one so much bought a second one to extend my watering area. Then first one started leaking all along the hose and around the faucet. Sprang leaks everywhere. Sprayed all over the place and me. This is my second one and 2 days after return policy it started doing the same thing.. So sorry, it really served my purpose as I am old and cannot lud around a big heavy hose to water my patio flowers. Sorry to advise not to buy. It breaks down quickly, but not in time to return.
customer_reviews.author: MAGGIE

customer_reviews.title: Light and flexible to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these hoses I have purchased and I think they are great! Most hoses are very heavy and difficult to move around the yard and garden for watering. This hose is easily maneuverable and flexible. The only criticism of this hose that I have heard is that it doesn't last as long as a regular hose. That may be so but it is a trade off for me as an older person who can't lift a heavy hose to water my garden and flowers. As with regular hoses I would recommend that you empty excess water out of the hose when finished using it as that seems to lengthen the life time of the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L Flacke

customer_reviews.title: MATERIAL FAULTY
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE HOW LIGHT IT IS AND TAKES UP LIMITED SPACE HOWEVER THE MATERIAL IS OF POOR QUALITY. THIS IS MY THIRD HOSE. I HAVE TWO HOSES AND BOTH STARTED LEAKING ALMOST AT THE SAME TIME. THEY ARE ABOUT 2 YEARS OLD. I KNOW WHY BUY ANOTHER. HOPING IT WILL NOT HAPPEN AGAIN AND I LIKE IT THAT MUCH. HOWEVER, THIS IS MY LAST. THE HOSES LEAK AT THE METAL CONNECTION. IT STARTS WITH ONE PIN HOLE AND THAN MORE START. I KNOW OF NO WAY TO REPAIR THE HOLES. I HOPE THE MANUFACTURE TAKES NOTE. THEY ARE A GREAT TOOL.
customer_reviews.author: d cox

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.  Compact and powerful, adjustable nozzle.
customer_reviews.text: This hoes was so easy to install and use. Fold up nicely into a little round bundle and is easy to conceal behind a bush in the front yard. I use it to water my flowers and fill my bird bath. It is perfect for my needs. The hose is soft and feels quite durable however I can't comment on that yet because I just started to use it. It is a lot better than my old one that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer helen

customer_reviews.title: Great hoses!
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of these hoses over the last couple of years and the fittings and hoses work great. I had an issue with one of the hoses after 2 years, I reached out to the company and they were great and stood behind the product! Easy to roll up when not in use, long enough to reach around both sides of the car when washing!
customer_reviews.author: Gene Goodell

customer_reviews.title: Love this hose for household cleaning jobs
customer_reviews.text: Honestly love this house. It's not bulky, it winds whichever way I need it to, it fits in an empty planter as a cover-up, it transfers good pressure from the spigot, and no water leaks from the spigot or the sprayer. The sprayer has the same options as most others I've used. With dogs, cat's, and kids I'm always washing or rinsing stuff on the side of the house and this hose is awesome for my mom jobs. I really hate standard rigid hoses though (and don't need the full-size throughput of a wider width hose).
customer_reviews.author: Shauna S

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and flexible
customer_reviews.text: I like the nozzle/sprayer that came with the hose. I really like how quick and easily the hose shrinks back to a small lightweight easy to store item. However, we have yet to get it to stretch anywhere near 50 feet and if you ease up on it at all while watering it tends to pull back. But, it is so light that it is easy to control and continue with the task at hand. It has been a pretty wet summer here so far; so perhaps when I use it more often it will stretch out more and meet all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: proxxie

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use the hose leaked so I contacted Scooters, the seller, and they honored the warranty and sent a replacement. Pleasantly surprised when the hose arrived much sooner than expected. I have another Growgreen hose that is about 3 years old and have never had a problem with it. The hose is light weight and easy to use. This is especially good if you have problems lifting heavy objects. I love it! I not only recommend the hose but I highly recommend the seller.
customer_reviews.author: jacr

customer_reviews.title: Light weight a d very functional.  Good value
customer_reviews.text: I selected this hose after reviewing similar hoses from various vendors. Although this hose was not the least expensive it did appear to be the best value. Since I have used this hose for only a couple weeks, I can not attest to its durability. This will have to stand up for several years through the Arizona heat and sun. The hose is light weight and very maneuverable. It has been easy to use and far more functional than my old hose that kinked and was hard to unroll. So far I have been very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Loving this hose!  No tangles, no kinks & flexable!
customer_reviews.text: I was so sick of our hose kinking everytime I tried to water the garden! Our old hose always seemed like it was just a little too short for whatever it was we needed it for, so after halling it across the yard only to find out it did not reach! I am very satisfied with this GrowGreen Hose, also I am happy to report - We no longer have the issues that we did with the old style hose! Now that I know this one doesn't kink or tangle I WANT ANOTHER ONE - (I'd be able to water the blvd too!).
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Correction to my negative review from a few hours ago. I missed an important step in the directions.
customer_reviews.text: I realize that I did not follow directions. The key to having the hose extend to a much longer length, is to shut the valve completely, let the hose fill with the valve closed, then open the valve to water or sprinkle. Then it stays long. So put another way, have the end of the hose closed while you turn on the faucet, when the hose is much longer, and full of water, you can open the end of the hose to water. sorry for my prior post, I will see if I can delete it.
customer_reviews.author: seattlegirl

customer_reviews.title: Garden Hose
customer_reviews.text: It not really as durable as you think. it definitely a light weight product but once the outter cotton is worn out is just a thing plastic inside that can break easily. I have buy several water hose that is retractable style like this before and within 1 month they usually break. Despite it been said strong and durable. It really not that durable and can break very easily if you use it roughly. So far it is not a bad product, i just wish it was more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Hoan T.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Had this hose for about 1 year and it's still in great shape. No issues with any leaks. All of my other flexible hoses have sprung a leak after the first year. Let's see if this one can keep going. It's been very convenient in terms of weight and being able to move it around and store it easily.
customer_reviews.author: KCTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Love these hoses - light  in weight and lasts
customer_reviews.text: I am in my seventies but still garden. I love these hoses (I have three of them) because they stretch to where I need them and when not in use immediately become much smaller. That way they are easily out of the way and I don't trip on them or have to move them for mowing. The other thing I really like is that they are very light in weight. As I said, I have three of them now - the oldest was from last year and still is in great shape. This past autumn I treated myself to two more.
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this garden hose!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice!This garden hose is just what I have been looking for. The outside faucet is right next to many plants and the regular heavy hose was impossible: always kinking, too heavy on the hose stand, took FOREVER to get it rolled correctly. I have been telling everyone about this hose! I don't know about durability yet as I just purchased this. BUT, I follow the directions and let all of the water out and you can watch it shrivel down to a handy size. The length is awesome, reaches farther than I ever thought. And the fact that it came with a spray nozzle? Great and great price, too! Amazing so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy M. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Not a Kink Anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It really seems incapable of kinking -- unlike every other "does-not-kink" hose I have every owned. Another feature: It holds a LOT of water and when that has all been squeezed out of it (I water flower pots and fill the bird bath) the hose shrinks to less than half its working length and that makes it really easy to store. Construction seems solid enough. There's a shut-off valve at the working end, a convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Best hose ever!
customer_reviews.text: BEST HOSE EVER! I've had a bunch of green hard hoses over the years that leak, break, cut off water when bent, and are just plain stubborn and heavy to move. This is the exact opposite. It moves easy, shrinks back small, lightweight, and doedn't leak! It's amazing. And I got one for my grandmother, which is perfect for a senior citizen! So easy for her to water her plants now! I love it and highly recommend to all users! Stretches really far even. Water doesn't even slow when it's all twisted up too! Ha! I actually want to go water plants now!
customer_reviews.author: Huntx7

customer_reviews.title: Compact, light-weight, flexible, excellent water delivery
customer_reviews.text: The 50-foot "Grow Green Expandable Garden Hose" is just right for my garden. It expands to a flexible, light-weight garden hose when the water is turned on, and when the water is turned off, it collapses to a flexible, compact, light-weight bundle that is easy to attractively store/hide in an 12-inch-diameter flower pot (or to hang on a small garden-hose hook of some sort). The extra washers and the adjustable spray nozzle are an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: G. D. Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had one of these a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this hose after my neighbor told me how great hers was. After shopping around, I really wanted one that had brass fittings rather than plastic. While I was looking for a 50 foot hose, I ended up with the 75. My husband has always had a "thing" against those collapsible hoses, but I finally caved and ordered this one! Wish I had done it years ago. This product is sturdy and well made. It is extremely maneuverable, light and easy to handle and the longer length is now something I am glad to have. I do suggest watching the video on how to use as it offers good tips on care as well. So glad I decided to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: BClovis

customer_reviews.title: easy to use...
customer_reviews.text: I love this hose, it is very light weight, it is easy to maneuver and drag around my yard to water. The nozzle is perfect and the "shower" option is perfect for watering my pots and other plants. When done watering, it shrinks up and is easy to put in my hose pot, until the next time. This is about the 6th hose of this type I have owned, they do not last as long as i would like, after several months, they spring a leak and are done. But, because of the ease of use, I will continue to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA MATTHEWS

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Just got my grow green hose three hours ago. Tried it out watering the lawn and washing the front walk. I expected it to become ridged and stiff to manage as well to shrink a lot when initiating water flow. Neither happened. This is my first hose of this type. After reading reviews over the years I was reluctant to purchase one. This hose was very easy to handle even when filled with water it was quite Light. For durability, we shall see. Love the green color.
customer_reviews.author: carl stahlhammer

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I just hate trying to maneuver a heavy garden hose, and tend to avoid tasks that use a hose, but I do believe this is going to change all that. This is a magical product. It's so lightweight and easy to use! I bought it to use with a pressure washer for my deck, and it made it so easy!! I've had cheap versions of this before, but this is a cut above for sure. It seems very durable, and has nice solid brass connectors. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DramaQueen

customer_reviews.title: Best expandable hose so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 50’ green hoses. It’s only been 1 week since I connected them. Thus far, they feel and look stronger than the competition. My only concern is their susceptibility to UV sunlight. As per instructions, they are kept in a hose pale which I placed a piece of plywood on top. It’s not a big deal, just something else to think about. The real test will be time. How long will they last. After all, they are not cheap hoses, and I hope I’m getting what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Hose DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: This was or second one of these green hoses from this seller. They both got holes in them and the holes were not from us being rough and dragging the hoses around. We were very careful making sure we lifted the hose and sat it down, this practice is based on passed experience with expandable hose. These green hose just sprung leaks from the water pressure. Whether you buy this expandable hose or another brand just be prepared to replace it within a few months as they do not last.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Best hose ever!
customer_reviews.text: This hose is perfect for me! It does everything it claims it will do. It's light weight, it contracts for ease of storage when you're finished using it, it's REAL easy to use, and it's durable. I will never go back to the clunky, heavy hoses of days gone by. I liked it so well last year, that I ordered another one this year. (each is 50 ft.) They fit together perfectly, and STILL very easy to use. I don't dread "getting the hose out" anymore.
customer_reviews.author: CJDahle

customer_reviews.title: Great hose!
customer_reviews.text: When I first hooked up this hose I was sure they sent me the wrong size. It was so short! When I turned the water on my goodness did it expand! This is my third retractable hose so I am not new to this. The other 2 lasted barely a season. One exploded and the other one leaked through its seam. This one is amazing. It is so light weight and easy to maneuver. And clean up is so easy as it folds up to nothing! Despite this it feels sturdy and not cheap. I am very pleased with this purchase and the fact that it comes with a lifetime warranty if you register it.
customer_reviews.author: betse

customer_reviews.title: 2 nd one
customer_reviews.text: bought one last summer, really liked it, bought another last week... all set i thought, last years sprung aleak in the middle of hose, guess they only last ayear, 90 day warranty...huhm? no way of reaching you, out of luck,live and learn...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less then 6 months only one month of daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 5 months ago, recently started using it daily due to it not raining. Was working great until today. Went to turn on the foscet and the hoses filled up half way and then started spraying out the sides. I used the for water I ng my laun and flowers and that's it. I let it fill up then open the nozzle like it said and it still broke. I'm disappointed. I really liked the light weight of this hose but reluctant to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: My wife has a new love.
customer_reviews.text: My wife was tired of, although never complaining about, lugging a typical garden hose to water her plants during the hot Texas summer weather. I bought her this hose and she was sold on it with her first use. I had a hose similar to this a few years ago. We did not make an effort to treat it carefully and it was trash after a few weeks. This one will get basic careful handling to get the most use possible.
customer_reviews.author: J. Black

customer_reviews.title: Great idea in theory - Leaky in practice
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this since last week of April. We used it here and there to water potted plants on the patio. It started showing pinhole leaks 2 weeks ago. I uploaded ONE example... It clearly has more than that judging by the puddle... It has 3 so far that I've been able easily to spot. I don't like spending $40 on something to see it start springing leaks in two months.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Light and compact
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hose because I had one exactly like this and Ioved it. I've only had the new one for a week but I expect that it will serve me well for several years...as long as I don't stretch it too much like I did the old one which caused the inner lining to detach from the fitting. It failed ONLY due to 'user error". Other than that, I really like this hose because it takes up very little space and is light weight and easy to handle. My yard is small and this is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Hose makes things much easier.
customer_reviews.text: This hose is not what I thought I ordered but once I have used it I think I like it better than what I thought I had ordered ( if that all makes sense). I am a widow of a man who kept our yard like a showpiece and I was trying to do what he did. I had about given up pulling the hoses from flower bed to flower bed until I got this hose. It makes life much easier. I only wish I had bought a longer one or two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Slick

customer_reviews.title: New, But So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: We've only used this a couple of times, so this review is somewhat incomplete. The hose is lightweight (a completed bonus for me), and doesn't have any leaks. It is nowhere near the 50' length it claims to be when in use, only stretches to somewhere around 35-40', but for us, that's sufficient. I'd read other reviews that said the same and was expecting it to be shorter. So far, no complaints. The nozzle is pretty decent, too.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Water pressure so important to determine length needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality product. The only reason that I didn't give it 5 starts is because they need to make a bigger deal of how important the water pressure is for this to stretch to the advertised length. We bought a 50 ft hose that only stretches to about 30 feet with the water pressure from our house bib. In our back yard, we have an unregulated bib that we put in and the hose we bought for the back yard fully expands.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd gotten them sooner!  Perfect for everyday and travel use
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of uses for hoses around my place, including when I go camping with my horses. It is SO SO SO SO nice to have a very lightweight but heavy-duty hose that can collapse down to almost nothing, and it is *SO* lightweight. Huge win as far as I'm concerned, as I am very much over the burden of dragging around dirty muddy heavy hoses. I still need some 100' rubber hoses for irrigating the pastures but literally everything else I do with these guys. -- Happy Camper.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work fine. I can't really comment on durability because I just started using it. I can say I'm happy so far and I'd buy it again if I needed another one. Almost off topic but I like the green color better than the black one I already have. We have a fair amount of snakes here in Texas so we're always on the lookout. The black hose really looks like a snake when it shrivels up after the water is turned off. Goofy as it sounds the green one does the same thing but somehow doesn't look as sinister :).
customer_reviews.author: Mike Schott

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hose on May 22, 2020, and threw it in the trash yesterday. What an expensive joke. It’s more like a toy than a hose. Watch it expand, twist, turn, contract—oh boy. The ridges in the hose restrict water flow, and the also trap dirt making it a muddy mess to handle. Yesterday the nozzle quit working on all settings. I have also purchased the NeverKink brand hoses. They KINK badly. Help.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to be able to connect this to other devices, like a sprinkler. but one end is permanently affixed to the hand sprinkler which emits a soft, perfect spray. 50 footer was deal for my small yard; light; minimal leaks around connections; takes strong water pressure; and collapses as advertised. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: scrivener

customer_reviews.title: Good Hose
customer_reviews.text: We received this a few days ago, and I have had the chance to use it a few times now. The quality appears good. The brass fittings are a good sign of overall quality. I love how much it expands and contracts to make it a very easy hose to use and put away. Good color, decent nozel. My only "issue" is the nozel does not have a very strong spray. It is possible that is my water pressure, I am not sure as this is a new hose location. Overall I would recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not roll onto a reel with hose pressurized
customer_reviews.text: I love this hose(I bought a second hose of 100') because it is so light. It is easy to haul out to the garden and roll back up again. The spray nozzle has several good settings. My only problem was rolling it onto the reel one time with the hose pressurized. When it collapsed, it formed a totally tangled mess on the reel. Took me forever to unreel it. Otherwise, this is a great hose and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: hande64

customer_reviews.title: Will not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Finally. After going through three other hoses, this is the one I have been looking for. It is well made, doesn't leak, is easy to manage and doesn't take up much space. As an added bonus I was pleasantly surprised it solved the issue of my anti-siphon spigot spraying all over the place. I no longer get wet when I turn off the water. This hose behaves itself. Does what it is supposed to and leaves me without frustration. As an FYI I'm an ordinary customer who does not receive any benefits from writing reviews. I will of course be recommending is hose.
customer_reviews.author: Meadowlark

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material broke within a month.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased June 26. Return window closed July 26. found hole in it on August 8! Only used for about 20 times. Since we we’re on a 2 week vacation. Always emptied water out of hose and it was just laying on our back patio. No sharp items nothing. Would be great but clearly a cheap material since we have only grass and concrete area with no sharp objects anywhere that could have caused this. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Maui lover

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to move around and easy to replace on the reel.
customer_reviews.text: I got rid of a heavy black very long hose that was so heavy the reel would hardly hold it.....very heavy and easily twisted dragging it around....couldn't kick it out of the way so fell over it often in order to use this new, light, easily handled lovely green hose, which practically reels itself back on the wall, and is a thousand times more convenient than my old one! I love it. It's exactly what I wanted for watering my flowers and washing my car. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality,  lightweight and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than the “as seen on TV” flex hose which disintegrated in 2 months. It’s way lighter and much more flexible than a regular garden hose. I like that this one came with the multi spray attachment. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS AND CHEAP - Do NOT Buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. After not even a month of being connected, the hose became disconnected from the brass connection to the water spout. Now, whenever I turn on the water, it gushes from that area and not from the hose opening at the other end. Since it is out of return, I am not able to do so. Now, I am stuck with an expensive piece of garbage. Read other one star reviews for more concerning horrible craftsmanship of such an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Cortez Jr.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Received my 50ft hose today. Switched out the old, in with the new. Why didn't I do this sooner! I love it. The hose was lightweight and I had no problem with tangling at all. The nozzle had many settings and the pressure was excellent. After watering, I let the pressure (water) out and it was back in its small shape....so easy to put away. So far, it seems very durable...time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hose about 6-8 weeks. I don't use it every day but I find it very easy to use when I do. I love that it isn't so bulky & hard to maneuver & shrinks up to a size that fits in a basket I have for it. It appears to be good quality & well made. I have had terrible luck with these types of hoses in the past. The interior tubing has broken lose sometimes on the first use or only after a few uses making them useless. I was skeptical about trying one of these again but glad I did. Sure hope it continues to serve me well. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So this hose is amazing so far. So much so, I bought a second one. The only time I have difficulty is when I need to stretch the hose to get it over to the other side of the yard. If the water isn't on, then the hose isn't expanded and for all I'm worth, I can't pull it hard enough to get it over there. That means I do get wet from time to time, but all of its other features make it worth while. I hate the old hoses that were so heavy and kinked just looking at them. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: JIP

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF THIS HOSE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hose in March. It is now leaking where the hose goes into the connector. There is no way to tighten the connection. Very disappointed that it is defective and I cannot return. I liked the hose so much I ordered a 2nd one a month later. Just waiting for this one to do the same thing. Cannot return it either as May 31 was the deadline. Seems the warranty is only 30 days!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Monty

customer_reviews.title: Great for backyard gardening
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes the GrowGreen garden hose. It is very easy to handle, less bulky than standard water hoses. The fittings appear to be of good quality and the 8 pattern nozzle works well. Can't really make a statement about the durability as we have only had this product for a short time. It does seem to be more durable from the short use we have had. Based on nothing more than how easy it is to handle, we will most likely have several of these to replace the older water hoses.
customer_reviews.author: MyView

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Very Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, but time will tell how durable this is. I replaced my old Home Depot one that basically fell apart at the faucet side, and this one seems more well made, so we'll see. I was skeptical about the plastic nozzle, but the assortment of different spray options made this one actually perform better than my previous all-metal one. Overall, quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JayV

product_meta.title: GrowGreen Garden Hose, Expandable Garden Hoses, Water Hose with High Pressure Hose Spray Nozzle, Flexible Garden Hose with All Brass Connectors, Leak Proof, Durable, Heavy Duty Material (50 Feet)
feature_bullets: SPACE EFFICIENT GARDEN HOSE: This amazing water hose starts out very short and expands 3 times its size when it gets under water pressure, but returns in seconds to its original compact length after the water is out!
A GARDEN HOSE DESIGNED TO MAKE LIFE MUCH EASIER: This newly designed expandable garden hose will never tangle, twist, or kink. This Flexible Garden Hose is compact and easy to store away!

HOSE SPRAY NOZZLE INCLUDED: The GrowGreen Garden Hose gets even better with our 8 pattern, high pressure hose spray nozzle! Made with all brass connectors, excellent corrosion resistance and durable quality.

EXPANDABLE GARDEN HOSE WITH HIGH PRESSURE-RESISTANT DURABLE LATEX! Normal operating water pressure 43.5-87PSI/3-6Bar, our new designed water hose can safely operate with water pressure up to 145PSI/10Bar!

GARDEN HOSE COMES WITH A LIFETIME MANUFACTURERS WARRANTY! We are so confident that you will love our garden hoses, but in case you don't, just contact the manufacturer or the seller via Amazon.com for any claims.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,535 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
